attributes.action: Re-Open the Mayfield Road Post Office, Downside, Dunstable, Bedfordhire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The closing of the Mayfield Road Post Office on Downside Estate in Dunstable, Bedfordshire has caused major suffering to a majority of residents around the District, And the closing of another post office within the area has only made this worse.
As Downside has a majority of OAP's, Disabled and young mothers it is a nessecity for this Post Office to Re-Open.
